testCase.requirementText: Indicates the status of the package using a fixed vocabulary. See also: dmdSec status
testCase.description: Status of the metadata. If used the two values “SUPERSEDED” or “CURRENT” from the vocabulary is used. The attribute is optionable via the METS schema and the METS standard, and there are no limits to the values in the attribute, so the CSIP tightens this

package.name: IP_rightsMD_missing_status_attribute
package.description: The package has an amdSec-element with no status-attribute

rule.description: The status-attribute for the amdSec-element should contain a value as taken from the vocubulary

error.message: The value is not found in the vocabulary

package.name: IP_rightsMD_status_attribute_wrong_value
package.description: The package has an rightsMD-element with a status-attribute which holds the value "TEST"
